Question: Is NEFT is mandatory for Payout.
Answers: 1.Yes NEFT is mandatory during New Enrollment or Geo Verification for AM Approval as in 2020 policy only NEFT is payout mode.

Question: Is NEFT is mandatory for Payout
Answers: Yes NEFT is mandatory during New Enrollment or Geo Verification for AM Approval as in 2020 policy only NEFT is payout mode

Question: Who can submit the NEFT details
Answers: BMD can submit the NEFT details via Web Portal or any user from FR to User can submit the same from Mobile Application

Question: Which documents are mandatory for NEFT details
Answers: Cancel Cheque and Consent Form with Seal or Sign is mandatory for NEFT submission (If Name is not imprinted on cancel cheque then Passbook copy to be submit the Cancel cheque for Beneficiary verification

Question: Unable to submit NEFT - Getting massage - Account already exists
Answers: If user getting massage NEFT already submitted it means Same account No. already exist in system, if user wants to remove from system and wants to update against new Mobile No. then Channel Manager Approval is required

Question: What are possibilities for NEFT rejection
Answers: 1. NEFT will be submit by User
3. NEFT cross verify by CTG when 1st time payout is doing on same Account No
4. Cancel Cheque, Consent Form or Cancel Cheque with Passbook Copy if Name is not imprinted is not attached
5. Attachments are not clearly visible - Agency unable to recognized the details
6. Concent Form not fulfilled by user properly - UID, Mobile No, Seal or Sign (any one) is missing on concern form.
7. Incorrect data entry during NEFT submission.

Question: Is any communication receiving by anyone if NEFT is rejected by Agency
Answers: Yes if NEFT is rejected by Agency Auto Trigger mail sent to respective BMD & Area Manager with reason

Question: Where I can know the NEFT rejection reason if other than mail
Answers: On rewards portal BMD can know the reason for NEFT rejection as per Account type selection
